DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess effect 28-day ferment milk product consumption twice daily intestinal gas production dihydrogen ( H2 ) methane ( CH4 ) healthy subject high H2 producer .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation 28-day Fermented Milk Product Consumption Twice Daily Compared Non-fermented Milk Product Intestinal Gas Production Healthy Subjects High Dihydrogen Producers
DOC.criteria: Subject body mass index ( BMI ) 18.0 30.0 kg/m2 ( bound exclude ) Subjects high dihydrogen ( H2 ) production define fast exhaled level H2 breath 10 part per million ( ppm ) . Women childbearing potential must use medically approve method contraception OR woman must postmenopausal least 12 month prior study entry Subject functional gastrointestinal disorder accord ROME III criterion ( Functional Bowel Disorders/FBD module , Functional Dyspepsia/FD module , Irritable Bowel Syndrome/IBS module ) Subject gastrointestinal disorder accord investigator 's medical assessment Subject take drug might modify gastrointestinal function Subject severe disease assess investigator ( ex : cancer , severe heart disease , kidney disease , neurological disease psychiatric disease , immunodeficiency disorder )
